entity.name: dddimcha
entity.description: Primary maintainer of embodiOS, a bare-metal AI operating system focused on deterministic, low-latency local LLM inference by minimizing OS-induced interference, especially Time To First Token (TTFT) and latency jitter.

projects.name: embodiOS
projects.description: embodiOS is a bare-metal AI operating system where AI inference is a first-class primitive. The project focuses on reducing end-to-end inference latency by collapsing Time To First Token (TTFT) and minimizing jitter, rather than optimizing decode throughput alone. This enables fast reaction times for embodied AI, robotics, and dedicated local inference devices.
